name: Hydrastinum muriaticum
details: Muriate of Hydrastis. Locally, in aphthous sore mouth, ulcers, ulcerated sore throat, ozaena, etc. Internally, third Dec. Trit. Is a uterine hemostatic and vasoconstrictor; metrorrhagia, especially from fibroid tumors; hemorrhages, IN DILATATION OF THE STOMACH, and chronic digestive disorders.
